faqs.q: Do you deliver to construction sites?
faqs.a: Yes, we deliver to construction sites in and around Eraur, Bhatar, and nearby areas. Delivery options and charges depend on location and order size.

faqs.q: Can I get today’s rod/cement rate?
faqs.a: Absolutely! Please call or WhatsApp us for the latest daily rates on rods, cement, and other materials. Rates may vary based on market and quantity.

faqs.q: Do you keep Berger Paint color options?
faqs.a: Yes, we stock Berger paint colors, primers, and putty. We can suggest shades and finishes for your project. Contact us for availability.
Our shop is open daily: Morning 7:00 AM – 1:00 PM, Evening 4:00 PM – 8:30 PM. Please confirm on festivals.
